main event: An unidentified silver object was observed in Sacramento, California on May 2, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as spherical and the size of a penny held at arm's length., The object traveled away from the observer at a speed much greater than that of a conventional jet., The sighting lasted between 3 to 10 minutes., There was a lack of follow-up investigation due to the brevity of the sighting and delay in the report's receipt., Another sighting reported a bright white light performing unusual flight patterns observed by a U.S. Air Force officer.
witness description: U.S. Air Force officer and other unidentified witnesses
